# <:rules_icon:1412467815184728104>Server Rules

## Rules to Follow

<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Always follow Japanese law and Discord's Terms of Service.
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Follow the instructions of the server administrators.

## Prohibited Actions

<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Spamming, excessive mentions, repeated identical messages, posting dangerous URLs, insults, or fights
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Any behavior that may disturb other users (or is judged as such by administrators)
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> NSFW chat outside of **__Category: ğŸ” NSFW__**
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Sharing personal information
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Advertising (except in <#1364228597211987988>)

## Other Rules

<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Use channels appropriate to the topic.
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> If you have questions about the rules, please open a ticket in <#1363470186287468724>.

Please follow the above to keep our community better. Depending on the severity of violations, actions such as mute, restriction, kick, or ban may be taken.

id:
# <:rules_icon:1412467815184728104>Aturan Server

## Peraturan yang Harus Dipatuhi

<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Patuhi hukum Jepang dan Ketentuan Layanan Discord.
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Ikuti instruksi dari administrator server.

## Larangan

<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Spam, mention berlebihan, mengirim pesan berulang dengan isi yang sama, mengirim URL berbahaya, kata-kata kasar, atau perkelahian
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Perilaku yang mengganggu atau berpotensi mengganggu pengguna lain (jika admin menilainya sebagai perilaku mengganggu)
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Obrolan NSFW di luar **__Kategori: ğŸ” NSFW__**
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Mengirim informasi pribadi
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Promosi (kecuali di <#1364228597211987988>)

## Aturan Lain

<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Gunakan channel yang sesuai dengan topik.
<:rules_red_circle:1412467938597798000> Jika ada pertanyaan tentang aturan, buat tiket di <#1363470186287468724>.

Harap patuhi aturan di atas untuk membuat server lebih baik. Bergantung pada tingkat pelanggaran, tindakan seperti mute, pembatasan, kick, atau ban dapat diambil.
